Package nub.core

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Graph
    A 2D or 3D scene-graph providing eye, input and timing handling to a raster or ray-tracing renderer.
    Interpolator
    A keyframe Catmull-Rom interpolator.
    MatrixHandler
    The matrix handler specifies (and implements) various matrix operations needed by the Graph to properly perform its geometry transformations.
    Node
    A node encapsulates a 2D or 3D coordinate system, represented by a Node.position(), an Node.orientation() and Node.magnitude().
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Graph.GridType  
    Graph.Type
    Enumerates the graph types.
    Graph.Visibility
    Enumerates the different visibility states an object may have respect to the bounding volume.
    Node.BullsEyeShape
